title: Auto-Llm-Deployment-with-lorax
description: Streamlined the training and deployment cycle through a “one-click” platform that automatically converts unstructured data into trainable formats and applies advanced tuning (LoRA, QLoRA, knowledge distillation). Implemented dual RAG pipelines (vector & graph DBs) boosting knowledge retrieval efficiency by 35%. Forged Jenkins CI/CD on AWS and created an Auto-LLM deployment pipeline with LORAX, cutting API rollout time by 50% and increasing inference efficiency by 70%.

title: RAG-using-zendesk-and-pinecone
description: Built a GPT-4 powered chatbot leveraging Zendesk APIs for real-time Auto-support ticket handling and Pinecone’s vector search for efficient knowledge retrieval, reducing manual ticket resolution time by 30%. Established a confidence-based fallback mechanism for human escalation. Designed a real-time monitoring pipeline with Prometheus and Grafana.

title: Body-Balancing-Task-guidance-using-CNN
description: Engineered CNN models integrated with IoT robotics for real-time body-balancing task guidance, boosting system accuracy and improving learning rate by 50%. Optimized TensorFlow Lite deployment on Raspberry Pi with AWS S3, reducing model size and cloud round-trip by 40%.

title: AI-Product-for-Visually-Impaired-Individuals
description: Developed an AI product to assist visually impaired individuals with public transportation, currency recognition, and road-crossing safety using real-time object detection (YOLOv5, Mobilenet) deployed on edge device (Raspberry Pi), achieving 95% accuracy. Integrated an audio-based interaction system.
aiHint: object detection bounding box bus currency

title: Podcast-generation-platform
description: Developed a solution that automatically fetches data from Twitter and Reddit, reducing content-scripting time by 70%. Utilized MongoDB for user profiles. Streamlined Eleven Labs for speech synthesis with GPT-4 via OpenAI’s API using Replit for cloud deployment, enabling on-demand podcasts generated in under 2 minutes.

title: Smart-Sprinkler-System
description: Pioneered a Random Forest Regressor (86% test accuracy) for predictive automated irrigation. Optimized a smart sprinkler system, reducing water consumption by 65% and outperforming competing solutions by 15%.

title: Virtual-Educator-using-Fine-tuned-GPT-3
description: Fine-tuned GPT-3 to serve as a virtual educator and applied customized reinforcement learning algorithms, enhancing skill acquisition by 60% through adaptive, real-time feedback.

title: TikTok TechJam Gen AI (Hackathon)
description: Secured Top 10 Finalists position in TikTok TechJam Hackathon for a Gen AI project, ranking among the top 0.3% of global participants.

title: Multimodal AI Video Generation (Hackathon)
description: Constructed a multimodal AI video generation system integrating news scraping and rapid video production. Completed in 48 hours and recognized as the best out of 70 teams, winning the OraHacks hackathon.
